about_the_game:
Malevolent Madness invites players to step into the foreboding world of mystery and danger with its captivating demo. Dive into the first 30 minutes of this intense horror-adventure and get a glimpse of the gripping story, challenging gameplay, and atmospheric tension awaiting in the full experience.

What to Expect in the Demo:

  • Introduction to the Storyline: Begin your journey as a scientist thrust into a sinister discovery—a malfunctioning time machine hidden within a dark cave. Experience the tension as you uncover the first hints of the machine’s horrifying power and the consequences it could unleash.

  • Thrilling Gameplay Mechanics: Navigate through dangerous environments using stealth and parkour abilities to evade relentless threats.

  • Engaging Puzzles: Encounter clever puzzles that introduce the game's cerebral challenges and hint at the deeper mysteries to come.

  • Immersive Atmosphere: Be captivated by high-quality visuals and an eerie soundscape that pulls you into the world of Malevolent Madness.

This demo provides a taste of the suspense and complexity that the full game promises, offering just enough to leave you wanting more.
detailed_description:
Roadmap

Roadmap

Our Malevolent Madness project aims to overcome the challenges in the gaming industry and deliver innovative solutions that cater to player needs. With your support, we aspire to create remarkable projects that capture attention in the gaming world.

1. Phase: Research and Development (Q1-Q2 2024)
During this phase, we will conduct in-depth research on game design to identify elements that enhance player experience. We will focus on character animations, visual design, and game mechanics to establish the core of our game design.

2. Phase: Prototype Development (Q3 2024)
In this phase, we will develop the first prototype of our project and conduct closed beta tests to gather feedback from players. The data collected during this process will help us optimize game mechanics and design.

3. Phase: Full Development (Q4 2024)
Based on the feedback received, we will mobilize all our resources to develop the full version of our game. During this phase, we will focus on graphic design, sound design, and artificial intelligence elements.

4. Phase: Launch and Promotion (Q1 2025)
Once the game is complete, we will implement our launch strategy and initiate marketing activities to promote our project. We aim to reach a broad audience through social media, gaming events, and other platforms.

5. Phase: Continuous Updates and Support (Q2 2025 and beyond)
After the launch, we will regularly update the game based on player feedback. Additionally, we will provide new content and expansions to offer players an ongoing experience.

Through this roadmap, we hope to create a better player experience in Malevolent Madness and our planned projects, together with your valuable support. Are you ready to embark on this journey with us?

short_description: In Malevolent Madness, explore a chilling world filled with mysteries and puzzles. As a gifted scientist, uncover the dark secret of a hidden time machine while evading sinister foes. Solve intricate challenges and unveil the truth behind your father's disappearance before reality unravels.
